data.title: Pivot WalkerÂ®
data.text:
Chief Pivot Walker is a complete manufactured product produced by Chief Fabrication and distributed by Wish Inc. Chief Pivot Walker replaces the wheels on a pivot irrigation system to prevent costly ruts!

Customers who use the Chief Pivot Walker are able to leave more crops in production and experience:

Less machinery wear and tear

No flat tires to change

No need to disc around circles left by wheel tracks

Less down time and energy use

Chief Pivot Walker has a patented design, is easy to install, and has self-cleaning footpads.

For more information about Chief Pivot Walker or to become a dealer, visit Pivotwalker.com
